duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and maintain effective long-term relationships with schools and school districts.
Create a minimum of four new sales opportunities per week.
Conduct effective discovery through a consultative sales process.
Document all customer-facing activities in Salesforce.
Complete 8-10 customer meetings per week via Zoom.
Develop strategic plans outlining target accounts, territory tactics, cadence, and timing.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Sales, Business, or related field (Master's preferred)
